title: DHS UAP Reports (Department of Homeland Security)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of each report of Unidentified Anomalous Phenomena (UAP), regardless of forum (air, water, space, transmedium) created by DHS personnel, systems or censors between November 18, 2024, and December 14, 2024. 

Please specifically task a search for Remote Video Surveillance Systems Upgrade (RVSS-U) camera systems, including Integrated Fixed Towers (see https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/25246431-2024-10-16-green-higgins-bishop-to-mayorkas-dhs-re-usbp-camera-towers/), CBP Air and Marine Operations (including manned DHS craft, unmanned DHS craft, CBP’s TARS aerostat device, and other systems) https://www.cbp.gov/sites/default/files/assets/documents/2021-Aug/TARS_508%20compliant.pdf, and the CBP Commissioner’s Office. 

Descriptions of these phenomena have used “drones” and “UAP” interchangeably. Please task a search that would yield UAP drone reports where the operator and origin has not been identified.

Thank you in advance for your timely cooperation and response. 

Pursuant to 5 C.F.R 5.5(e), I respectfully request expedited processing. I provide the following statements under penalty of perjury pursuant to 28 USC 1746, declaring that they are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and understanding: 

1. Recent reports of UAP have created a subject of exceptional and widespread media interest about which there exists questions regarding the government’s conduct..
See, e.g., and sources cited in paragraphs below.
 A. https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/drone-sightings-spread-new-jersey-officials-express-outrage-federal-re-rcna184107 
 B. https://www.cbsnews.com/news/drones-new-jersey-what-we-know/
 C. https://www.cnn.com/2024/12/12/us/new-jersey-drone-sightings/index.html
 D. https://apnews.com/article/fbi-drones-new-jersey-0f4aba00748ac464d42270fbe7457733
 E.  https://www.pbs.org/newshour/nation/what-we-know-about-the-mysterious-drones-flying-over-new-jersey
 F. https://www.forbes.com/sites/stephenpastis/2024/12/11/unexplained-reports-of-drones-flying-over-new-york-new-jersey-and-pennsylvania-heres-what-we-know/

2. Beginning on or around November 18, 2024, multiple reports of UAP over the skies of New Jersey began to pour in. 

3. The UAP sightings occurred above one of the homes of the President-elect, and highly sensitive U.S. military installations, including the Picatinny Arsenal (see https://www.nrc.gov/info-finder/decommissioning/complex/picatinny-arsenal.html). 

4. DHS is reportedly assisting in the federal coordination of the government’s response to these UAP reports. https://defensescoop.com/2024/12/12/new-jersey-unidentified-drones-dod-poised-to-respond-if-threaten-military-assets/; https://apnews.com/article/fbi-drones-new-jersey-a978470fa3bb07ed3e98c5b7c18f0abb

5. On December 13, DHS and FBI released a joint statement regarding this response: https://www.dhs.gov/news/2024/12/12/joint-dhsfbi-statement-reports-drones-new-jersey. https://www.insidegovernmentcontracts.com/2024/01/implications-of-the-unidentified-anomalous-phenomena-uap-amendment-in-the-2024-national-defense-authorization-act-ndaa/ 

6. To date, despite abundant video evidence, official confirmation from law enforcement and state officials, and federal lawmakers’ questions, the government is unable to identify the origin, operator, or technological nature of the phenomena. https://www.npr.org/2024/12/11/nx-s1-5226000/new-jersey-drones.
 
7. Instead, senior White House officials appear to dispute what people, including law enforcement officers, are witnessing and recording. https://www.twz.com/air/white-house-says-none-of-the-new-jersey-visual-drone-sightings-have-been-corroborated. 

8. Congress has held briefings on these phenomena; they produced no definitive answers from the U.S. government. https://ktxs.com/news/nation-world/pentagon-officials-hold-classified-briefing-with-congressn-uaps-ufos-new-jersey-sightings-drones-police-fbi-faa-regulations-bedminster-donald-trump-military-sites; https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/pentagon-officials-hold-classified-briefing-with-congressn-uaps-ufos-new-jersey-sightings-drones-police-fbi-faa-regulations-bedminster-donald-trump-military-sites

9. In the absence of definitive, public assessments, elected officials are considering a limited declaration of emergency: https://www.upi.com/Top_News/US/2024/12/10/New-Jersey-Jon-Bramnick-drones-UAP-UFO-limited-emergency/9881733858673/. 

10.  Congress previously required collection of UAP records by no later than February 2024 in sections 1841-43of the FY23 National Defense Authorization Act’s adaptation of the UAP Disclosure Act of 2023. https://www.insidegovernmentcontracts.com/2024/01/implications-of-the-unidentified-anomalous-phenomena-uap-amendment-in-the-2024-national-defense-authorization-act-ndaa/.  

11. The White House has declared the sightings are not attributable to a foreign nation. https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2024/12/13/drones-over-new-jersey-white-house-lawmakers/76956011007/. 

12. Government officials, including DOD’s Susan Gough, have stated that the UAP activity is not attributable to a U.S. research program. 

13. At least one U.S. Senator has called for U.S. military assets to shoot down these UAP, notwithstanding the publicly stated position of federal and state officials that they are not hostile, not experimental, and not identified. https://abc7ny.com/post/new-jersey-drones-us-senator-says-mystery-devices-spotted-nj-should-shot-down-necessary/15647143/. 

14. True to form, New Jersey residents have also suggested taking matters into their own hands and shooting down the phenomena as well. https://www.foxnews.com/us/drones-mystery-new-jersey-homeowners-threaten-take-matters-own-hands-govt-doesnt-act.

15. In the absence of clear, consistent communications from U.S. officials, heightened tensions regarding the inability or unwillingness of the government to explain what is happening above the skies of New Jersey, there is an increasing risk to the health and safety of people who are making the reports and capturing the video images of whoever or whatever is visiting the Garden State.

16. I am a member of the media primarily engaged in information dissemination.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Free
